body_html: It won’t get unbounded because you’ll likely OOM, but I can’t see how this is more dangerous than what we have now. After all we do allow having multiple communicators when they’re in different groups but that’s no different from NCCL’s point of view (it’s unaware of our groups).
body_text: It won’t get unbounded because you’ll likely OOM, but I can’t see how this is more dangerous than what we have now. After all we do allow having multiple communicators when they’re in different groups but that’s no different from NCCL’s point of view (it’s unaware of our groups).
body: It won’t get unbounded because you’ll likely OOM, but I can’t see how this is more dangerous than what we have now. After all we do allow having multiple communicators when they’re in different groups but that’s no different from NCCL’s point of view (it’s unaware of our groups).
